statements: SELECT * FROM JobSchedules;
SELECT job_id, task_name, server_name, status FROM JobSchedules WHERE status='Pending';
SELECT task_name, start_time, end_time FROM JobSchedules WHERE server_name='Server-A' ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT job_id, task_name, status FROM JobSchedules WHERE start_time >= '2022-01-01' AND end_time <= '2022-02-28';
SELECT job_id, task_name, server_name FROM JobSchedules ORDER BY server_name, task_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM JobSchedules WHERE job_id = 1;
SELECT task_name, server_name, start_time FROM JobSchedules WHERE status = 'Complete' ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT job_id, server_name FROM JobSchedules WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01' AND end_time < '2022-02-01';
SELECT task_name, task_name AS renamed_task, end_time FROM JobSchedules WHERE job_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY end_time ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT server_name FROM JobSchedules WHERE status <> 'Failed';
SELECT * FROM job_schedules;
SELECT task_name, execution_time FROM job_schedules ORDER BY execution_time DESC;
SELECT task_name, server_name FROM job_schedules WHERE server_name='Server1';
SELECT server_name AS Server, COUNT(schedule_id) AS TotalSchedules FROM job_schedules GROUP BY server_name;
SELECT server_name, ip_address, os_type FROM servers WHERE os_type='Linux';
SELECT * FROM job_schedules WHERE task_name = 'Backup';
SELECT task_name, server_name FROM job_schedules WHERE server_name LIKE 'Production%';
SELECT DISTINCT server_name FROM job_schedules ORDER BY server_name DESC;
SELECT task_name, execution_time FROM job_schedules WHERE execution_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT task_name, server_name, ip_address FROM job_schedules JOIN servers ON job_schedules.server_name = servers.server_name WHERE os_type = 'Linux';
SELECT * FROM job_schedules;
SELECT task_name, server_name, start_time FROM job_schedules WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, server_name, status FROM servers ORDER BY server_name DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE task_type = 'Backup';
SELECT id, server_name, ip_address, status FROM servers WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM job_schedules WHERE server_name='Server-A' ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT task_name, start_time FROM job_schedules WHERE frequency='1 day' AND start_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY task_name ASC;
SELECT task_name, server_name, start_time FROM job_schedules JOIN servers ON job_schedules.server_name=servers.server_name WHERE servers.status='Active' ORDER BY start_time;

SELECT task_name, server_name, start_time, frequency, ip_address FROM job_schedules JOIN servers ON job_schedules.server_name=servers.server_name WHERE servers.ip_address LIKE '192.168%' ORDER BY server_name, frequency;
SELECT DISTINCT task_name, task_type FROM tasks WHERE task_type='Maintenance' AND creation_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY task_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_machines;
SELECT task_name, frequency FROM tasks ORDER BY frequency DESC;
SELECT server_name, ip_address FROM servers WHERE location = 'US';
SELECT vm_name, owner FROM virtual_machines WHERE status = 'Running';
SELECT server_name, location FROM servers ORDER BY server_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM job_schedules ORDER BY schedule_time DESC;
SELECT task_name, server_name, vm_name, schedule_time FROM job_schedules WHERE task_name='Backup' AND server_name='ServerA';
SELECT tasks.task_name, tasks.description, job_schedules.schedule_time FROM tasks JOIN job_schedules ON tasks.task_name = job_schedules.task_name;
SELECT server_name, COUNT(*) AS number_of_tasks FROM job_schedules GROUP BY server_name ORDER BY number_of_tasks DESC;
SELECT vm_name, status FROM virtual_machines WHERE owner='Alice' OR owner='Bob' ORDER BY vm_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM job_schedules WHERE server_id = 1;
SELECT job_name, schedule_time FROM job_schedules WHERE vm_id = 3;
SELECT server_name, ip_address FROM servers WHERE os_version = 'Ubuntu';
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT vm_name, status FROM virtual_machines WHERE vm_type = 'Production';
SELECT * FROM job_schedules WHERE server_id = 1;
SELECT server_name, ip_address FROM servers WHERE os_version = 'Linux';
SELECT vm_name, status FROM virtual_machines WHERE vm_type = 'Production' ORDER BY vm_name DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01' AND created_at < '2022-02-01';
SELECT server_name, task_name FROM servers s INNER JOIN server_tasks st ON s.server_id = st.server_id INNER JOIN tasks t ON t.task_id = st.task_id;
